author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Universal Hospital Services Q1 Revenue Rose 9 Pct To $142.4 Mln
text:
May 14 (Reuters) - Universal Hospital Services Inc :
* UNIVERSAL HOSPITAL SERVICES REPORTS 2018 FIRST QUARTER RESULTS
* Q1 REVENUE ROSE 9 PERCENT TO $142.4 MILLION * UNIVERSAL HOSPITAL SERVICES- ADJUSTED EBITDA 3 MONTHS ENDED MARCH 31, WAS $39.9 MILLION, A $5.1 MILLION OR 14.5 PERCENT RISE FROM ADJUSTED EBITDA FOR SAME PERIOD 2017 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
